alert.note: Alert for Cayuga; Seneca (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 2:20PM EDT until July 24 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Seneca County in central New York... Northwestern Cayuga County in central New York... * Until 315 PM EDT. * At 219 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Canoga, or near Seneca Falls, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Auburn, Seneca Falls, Fayette, Fleming, Union Springs, Aurora, Cayuga, Levanna, Venice Center and Canoga. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
